original_text: The Lord will cause you to have boils on your knees and on your legs. They will give you much pain and they will never get better. They will soon cover your whole body, from your toes to the top of your head.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 무릎과 다리를 쳐서 고치지 못할 심한 종기를 생기게 하여 발바닥에서부터 정수리까지 이르게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will cause you to have boils
on your knees and on your legs
They will give you much pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 너에게 많은 고통을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will never get better
They will soon cover your whole body
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 곧 네 몸 전체를 덮을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: from your toes to the top of your head
